name: Wisielec
overview: Wisielec is a medieval themed word-guessing game based on Hangman. To save the life the player has to guess the password. Before each round the player gets to know the category. The player may choose each of the letters (consonants and vowels), wrong answer means the loss of one point and ends up drawing a part of a hanged man. Good answer gives one point. Error-free guess gives bonus points - depending on the number of letters occurring in the password. The game features ten difficulty levels .
